column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ mfe ebien ekyir no
column3: Farao soo daa: na ohun dɛ nna ogyina esutsen Nael no ho."

column2: "Na ohun dɛ anantwiber esuon a hɔn ho yɛ fɛw na wɔadɔ seradze
column3: fi esutsen no mu puei; na wobedzidzii wɔ sar no do."

column2: "Na hwɛ
column3: anantwiber esuon afofor so fi esutsen no mu dzi hɔn ekyir puei a hɔn ho yɛ tantan na wɔafomfɔn; na wobegyinaa anantwiber esuon no nkyɛn wɔ esutsen no no kɔn do."

column2: "Na anantwiber esuon a hɔn ho yɛ tantan na wɔafomfɔn no
column3: memeen anantwiber esuon a hɔn ho yɛ fɛw na wɔadodɔ seradze no. Nna Farao nyanee."

column2: "Na ɔdae na ɔsoo daa bio: na ohun dɛ
column3: eburow mbɛtsem esuon efifir eburonan kor do
column4: amaama na oye."

column2: "Na hwɛ
column3: mbɛtsem esuon a ɔyɛ nkɔkɔr na boka mframa enyinyam no fifirii dzii hɔn ekyir."

column2: "Na mbɛtsem nkɔkɔr no memeen mbɛtsem esuon a eburow wɔ mu na ɔyɛ amaama no. Na Farao nyanee
column3: na
column4: hwɛ

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ anapa no
column3: n’ahom annka noho; na ɔsomae ma wɔkɛfrɛfrɛɛ Egypt nkongyaayifo nyinara
column4: nye enyansafo a wɔwɔ hɔ nyinara ma wɔbae: na Farao kaa n’adaaso no kyerɛɛ hɔn; naaso obiara enntum annkyerɛ ase annkyerɛ no."

column2: "Nna nsahyɛfo panyin no kaa kyerɛɛ Farao dɛ
column3: Mekaa mo mfom ndɛ:"

column2: "Farao no bo fuuw no nkowaa
column3: emi nye paanootofo panyin no: na ɔdze hɛn koguu efiadze wɔ abrafohen no ne fie
column6: emi nye paanotonyi no; a ɔsor obiara ne daa nye mbrɛ ne nkyerɛase tse."

column2: "Na yɛkaa kyerɛɛ Hebriwnyi aberantsɛ bi
column3: abrafohen no n’akowaa a nna ɔnye hɛn wɔ hɔ no
column4: na ɔkyerɛɛ hɛn daa no ase; dɛ mbrɛ ɔbaako ne daa tse no ara na ɔkyerɛɛ no ase."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔyɛɛ hɔ dɛ mbrɛ ɔkyerɛɛ hɛn ase no ara; emi emaa mikedzii me dzibew
column3: na ɔno esɛɛn no."

column2: "Na Farao somae ma wɔkɛfrɛɛ Josef
column3: na wɔyɛɛ ntsɛm dze no fii efiadze no mu hɔ puei: na osusuae
column4: na ɔsesaa n’atar

column2: "Na Farao see Josef dɛ
column3: Maso daa
column4: na obiara nnyi hɔ a otum kyerɛ ase: na ɔwo na matse wo nka dɛ

column2: "Na Josef buaa Farao dɛ
column3: Onnyi mo mu: Nyankopɔn na ɔbɛma Farao asomdwee mbuae."

column2: "Na Farao kaa kyerɛɛ Josef dɛ
column3: M’adaaso mu no
column4: hwɛ
column5: nna migyina esutsen Nael no kɔn do:"

column2: "na muhun dɛ anantwiber esuon a wɔadɔ seradze na hɔn ho yɛ fɛw fi nsu no mu bae; na wobedzidzii sar no do:"
"na hwɛ
column3: anantwiber esuon afofor so dzi hɔn ekyir bae a wɔyɛ mbɔbɔr na hɔn ho tantanntan nkamfenkamfe
column4: a munnhun hɔn ho ne tantan ne saso wɔ Egypt asaase nyinara do da:"

column2: "na anantwiber a wɔyɛ nkamfenkamfe na hɔn ho tantan no memeen anantwiber esuon a wɔadɔ seradze a wodzii kan no."
"Na aber a wowiee hɔn memen no
column3: obi ennhu dɛ woewie hɔn men: osiandɛ nna hɔn ho da ho ara yɛ tantan dɛ nkan no ara so bio. Nna minyanee."

column2: "Na muhun wɔ m’adaaso mu bio
column3: na hwɛ
column4: mbɛtsem esuon efifir eburonan kor do

column2: "na muhun dɛ mbɛtsem esuon a enyinyam
column3: na ɔyɛ nkɔkɔr
column4: na boka mframa ama woetwintwam fifirii

column2: "na mbɛtsem esuon nkɔkɔr no memeen mbɛtsem esuon a oye no. Mekaa kyerɛɛ nkongyaayifo no; naaso obiara nnyi hɔ a otumii kyerɛɛ me ase."
"Na Josef see Farao dɛ
column3: Farao n’adaaso ebien no yɛ kor: dza Nyankopɔn rebɛyɛ na oeyi akyerɛ Farao no."

column2: "Anantwiber pa esuon no yɛ mfe esuon; na mbɛtsem pa esuon no yɛ mfe esuon: daa no yɛ kor."
"Na anantwiber esuon a wɔafomfɔn na hɔn ho yɛ tantan no a wodzii hɔn ekyir bae no
column3: yɛ ɔkɔm mfe esuon
column4: mbɛtsem esuon nkɔkɔr a boka mframa ama enyinyam no so dɛmara; ɔbɛyɛ ɔkɔm mfe esuon."

column2: "Ɔno nye asɛm a mekaa mekyerɛɛ Farao no; dɛ dza Nyankopɔn rebɛyɛ nna oeyi akyerɛ Farao no."
"Hwɛ
column3: mfe esuon reba a edziban piinara bɛba Egypt asaase nyinara do:"

column2: "na ɔno n’ekyir no nna ɔkɔm mfe esuon bɔsoɛr; na werɛ befir edziban pii no nyinara wɔ Egypt asaase do; na ɔkɔm no bɛhyew asaase no;"
"na osian ɔkɔm a odzi ekyir no ntsi wɔnnkɛkaa edziban pii no wɔ asaase no do; osiandɛ no mu bɛyɛ dzen dodow."
"Na sɛ adaaso no yɛɛ mbɔho ebien maa Farao a
column3: nna ne siantsir nye dɛ
column4: Nyankopɔn esi no pi
column5: na Nyankopɔn bɛma ayɛ hɔ ntsɛntsɛm."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei wɔmma Farao nhwehwɛ nyimpa a ɔyɛ ɔbadwembanyi nye onyansafo
column3: na ɔnyɛ no panyin wɔ Egypt asaase do."

column2: "Wɔmma Farao nyɛ iyi
column3: na ɔnhyehyɛ ahwɛdofo wɔ asaase no do
column4: na wɔngyegye Egypt asaase do edziban no mbumu enum enum wɔ mfe esuon a edziban pii wɔ mu no mu."

column2: "Na wɔmma wɔmboaboa mfe pa a ɔreba yi no mu edziban nyinara ano
column3: na wɔmfa eburow nhyehyɛ asan do wɔ Farao ne nsa ase
column4: ma ɔnyɛ edziban wɔ nkurow no mu

column2: "Na edziban no bɛyɛ dza wɔakora ama asaase no dze esie ɔkɔm mfe esuon a ɔbɛba Egypt asaase do no; amma asaase no aannsɛɛ wɔ ɔkɔm no mu."
"Na asɛm no yɛɛ Farao nye no nkowaa nyinara dɛw."
"Na Farao see no nkowaa dɛ
column3: Ana yebenya nyimpa a ɔtse dɛ oyi
column4: nyimpa a Nyankopɔn no sunsum wɔ no mu yi?"

column2: "Na Farao see Josef dɛ
column3: Susuampa dɛ Nyankopɔn dze iyi nyinara akyerɛ wo yi
column4: obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔyɛ ɔbadwembanyi nye onyansafo dɛ ɔwo:"

column2: "ɔwo na ebɔhwɛ me fi yi do
column3: na dza ebɛka no
column4: dza me man nyinara bedzi do nye no; gyedɛ ahengua no nkotsee na medze mebɛsen wo."

column2: "Na Farao see Josef dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: mayɛ wo Egypt asaase nyinara do panyin."

column2: "Na Farao worɔɔw no nsɔwanonkaba wɔ ne nsa
column3: na ɔdze hyɛɛ Josef ne nsa
column4: na ɔhyɛɛ no ndwera pa ntar
column5: na ɔdze sika ntweaban too no kɔn mu;"

column2: "na ɔmaa ɔtsenaa ne tseaseanam a otsia ebien no mu; na wɔpaa mu wɔ n’enyim dɛ
column3: Obiara mbu nkotodwe; na ɔyɛɛ no Egypt asaase nyinara do panyin."

column2: "Na Farao see Josef dɛ
column3: Emi nye Farao
column4: na obiara nnkokwetsir wo ayɛ biribiara wɔ Egypt asaase nyinara do."

column2: "Na Farao frɛɛ Josef ne dzin Zafenat-panea; na ɔdze On ɔsɔfo Potifera ne babaa Asenat maa no awar."
"Na aber a Josef kopuee Egypthen Farao n’enyim no
column3: nna oedzi mfe eduasa. Na Josef fii Farao n’enyim
column4: na okekyimaa Egypt asaase nyinara do."

column2: "Na bafuu mfe esuon no mu no
column3: edziban baa asaase no do ma obuu do."

column2: "Na ɔboaboaa mfe esuon edziban a ɔbaa Egypt asaase do no nyinara ano
column3: na ɔdze siesiee nkurow no mu: nhaban a wɔabɔ nkurow no nyinara ho aprɔw no mu edziban na ɔdze siesiee nkurow no mu."

column2: "Na Josef boaboaa eburow ano dɛ mpoano anhwea; ɔdɔɔ so dodow
column3: ma nkyii ogyaa kan mpo; osiandɛ wobu ano a ɔnnyɛ yie."

column2: "Wɔwoo mba beenu maa Josef ansaana ɔkɔm afe no rudu
column3: hɔn a On ɔsɔfo Potifera ne babaa Asenat woo hɔn maa no no a."

column2: "Na Josef frɛɛ abakan no ne dzin Manaasɛ: Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Nyankopɔn ama mo werɛ efir me berɛ nyinara
column4: nye m’egya fie nyinara."

column2: "Na nyia otsia ebien no ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Efraim: osiandɛ ɔsee dɛ Nyankopɔn ama mawo wɔ amandzehu asaase no do."
"Na ndɔbaa pii a ɔbaa Egypt asaase do mfe esuon no bɔɔ adze."
"Na ɔkɔm mfe esuon hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔreba
column3: dɛ mbrɛ Josef see no ara; na ɔkɔm baa asaase nyinara do: nna Egypt asaase nyinara do dze
column4: edziban wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na ɔkɔm kaa Egypt asaase nyinara no
column3: ɔman no sui tɔɔ Farao do gyee edziban: na Farao see Egyptfo no nyinara dɛ
column4: Hom nkɔ Josef hɔ; dza ɔbɛse hom no

column2: "Na ɔkɔm no baa asaase nyinara do
column3: na Josef buebuee mbrɛ edziban wɔ no nyinara
column4: na ɔtɔnee maa Egyptfo no; na ɔkɔm no mu yɛɛ dzen wɔ Egypt asaase do."

column2: "Na aman nyinara baa Josef hɔ wɔ Egypt bɔtɔɔ eburow; osiandɛ ɔkɔm no mu yɛɛ dzen wɔ asaase nyinara do."
